short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read one line from Pudhiya Aathichoodi by Mahakavi Bharathiyar everytime you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a little inspiration to your day!

Experience a touch of timeless wisdom every time you open a new tab with our Pudiya Aathichoodi Chrome extension! Dive into the profound teachings of Bharathiyar, one of India's greatest poets, with a new line from his Pudiya Aathichoodi each time you open a new tab. Alongside the original Tamil verse, you'll find easy-to-read transliteration and an insightful English translation, making it accessible to everyone. ðŸ˜„

Have any suggestions for improvement? Get in touch here: https://forms.gle/N2TkNEQvNNtUBcJP6
